title: datalad siblings add hangs
body:
#### What is the problem?

I would like to add some metadata to some existing datasets in datalad.datasets.org. I thought I could
1) install datalad.datasets.org locally
2) create a git repo named datalad.datasets.org in my github workspace
3) add locally some metadata
4) create a new "siblings" with 

`datalad siblings add -d . -s jb --url git@github.com:jbpoline/datasets.datalad.org.git`

change things locally and then publish on git@github.com:jbpoline/datasets.datalad.org.git

This takes a **very** long time ... but eventually (5-10min ?) tells me:
[INFO   ] Failed to enable annex remote jb, could be a pure git or not accessible 
[WARNING] Failed to determine if jb carries annex. Remote was marked by annex as annex-ignore.  Edit .git/config to reset if you think that was done by mistake due to absent connection etc 

So, **DataLad is right** :)  There was nothing at this url yet. 
But 1) should it just quickly say that there is not annex ?  2) what kind of check is done at that stage ? 3) am I taking the right route ? 
 

#### What version of DataLad are you using (run `datalad --version`)? On what operating system (consider running `datalad wtf`)?

DataLad
=======
Version     : 0.10.2
Full version: 0.10.2

System
======
OS          : posix Linux 4.4.8-040408-generic #201604200335 SMP Wed Apr 20 07:37:30 UTC 2016
Distribution: Ubuntu/16.04/xenial
